MWC.TacticalData

Class Fix

  • java.lang.Object
    • MWC.TacticalData.Fix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Fix
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    a composite structure containing a time stamp, a location, and a set of vessel parameter
    See Also:
